MAIN_MESSAGE: There is an unplanned power cut in the KA7 postcode area of Ayr affecting properties in Forehill Road, Holmston Drive and Glencair Road. We did not know in advance there would be a power cut however our engineers have now arrived on site in order to repair a faulty pillar, we have had to carry out an emergency shutdown at 1:45pm. This may affect the supply to your property. We will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible by 8pm. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 2:15pm on the 13th October 2020
